thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Joe R. USA
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Joe R. USA

author: Joe R. USA
title: Joe R. USA
text:
The trip was well planned and executed. It was good value as too. The accommodations exceeded my expectation in Bangkok and Siem Reap. The only advice I would offer is to drop the Lake visit in Cambodia, it was not interesting and the area was depressing to pass through due to the conditions.
Our guides and drivers were excellent and could not be more accommodating to our needs.
